content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a jungle_fence, I need to craft jungle_planks, which requires placing a jungle_log in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the jungle_log from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: After crafting the jungle_planks, I need to store them in the inventory so I can use them later. I will move the jungle_planks from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: I need to craft jungle_fence which requires 2 sticks and 4 jungle_planks. The sticks are already in the crafting grid, so I will move the first jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I will move the stick from slot 32 to slot 2 which is to the right of the jungle_plank I just moved.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: Next I will move the second jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 3 which is below the first jungle_plank.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: I will now move the third jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 4 which is to the right of the stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: Next I will move the second stick from slot 32 to slot 5 which is to the right of the third jungle_plank.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: Finally I will move the fourth jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 6 which is below the second stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 6 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_fence by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
